name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: In an interview this week, Barbra Streisand revealed that she cloned her favorite dog, twice. Barbra said, "I couldn't help myself, he was delicious."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Kylie Jenner's baby daughter has made her debut on Snapchat at one month old. In the Kardashian world, that is known as a "late bloomer."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The CEO of SeaWorld has stepped down. He's going to be getting a $10 million retirement package â€“ if he can jump up and catch it with his mouth.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The Las Vegas airport has asked passengers to dispose of their marijuana in a special box. In a related story at Las Vegas airport today, Willie Nelson was found hiding in a box.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The Number 1 reason that prospective applicants are rejected from the show "The Bachelor" is herpes. Apparently, you can't get on the show if you don't have it.
